title: publiclibraries.com, West Virginia Public Libraries, West Virginia, 1.2008
name: publiclibraries.com, West Virginia Public Libraries, West Virginia, 1.2008
description: This dataset displays the locations of all the public libraries in the state of West Virginia. The data included is the name of the library, name of the library system, library's address, phone, and lat/lon coordinates. The data came from publiclibraries.com which is a updated directory of all the public libraries throughout the United States.
